cast.name: 尼可莱·格洛斯 Nikolaj Groth

introduction: As Sofie turns 30, she begins to feel the pressure of having to settle down. Out of her increasing desperation, she begins using AirBnB as a dating portal - she simply sublets one of the rooms in her apartment to a new man (or woman) every weekend in her search for "the one". Why go out and search when you can just pick and choose future lovers online and have them come to you? Sofie's room mate and best friend, Naja, does not agree with this method of dating but still goes along with the project. Afterall, what are friends for?
